show_name: Coo: Tōi Umi kara Kita Coo (movie)
other_title: Coo - Der Dino aus dem Meer (German)
Coo Che Arrivo' da un Mare Lontano (Italian)
Coo: Come From a Distant Ocean Coo
plot: After a storm hits their island, Yusuke (driving his jet-ski) finds a baby dinosaur. He show it to his dad, they keep it and call it Coo. But here are other parties interested in a 65 milion year old creature ...
ending_theme: "Children of the World" by Julian Lennon
